name: Advanced Web Development Course
details: Advanced Web Development is one of the critical areas of computer science. It includes web designing, programming, database management, and other related staff. Web Development is all about creating, building, and maintaining websites and web applications. It includes web designing, programming, database management, and other related staff. To run a website successfully, some parameters should be met that are also part of the Web Development process. Speed, Stability, Robustness, Accessibility, and Usability; these properties need to be maintained.Advanced Web Development is one of the critical areas of computer science. It is performed to maintain large-scale web applications, social media, advertising, etc. The difference between Advanced Web Development and Web Development is that in advanced web development web services are used that are beyond web service standards.

name: Digital Marketing Course
details: This Digital Marketing Training Program provides a detailed understanding of Digital Marketing concepts, strategies, and implementation, including planning a website, website promotion, email and Search Engine Optimization (SEO) campaigns, and integrating digital marketing with traditional marketing.This Digital Marketing Training Program provides a detailed understanding of Digital Marketing concepts, strategies, and implementation, including planning a website, website promotion, email and Search Engine Optimization (SEO) campaigns, and integrating digital marketing with traditional marketing.Covering best practices and using case studies throughout, the session offers a practical guide to the core techniques in digital marketing. Online tools and reference materials are highlighted throughout, enabling delegates to leave with solid hands-on knowledge that they can implement immediately upon return to the office.After completing the course students will become expert Digital Marketers. They will become certified in social media marketing(Ex: Facebook, Instagram, Linkedin & Pinterest Marketing), Search Engine Optimization, Google Ads(PPC), Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, YouTube marketing, Email Marketing, Reddit Marketing and many more.

name: Professional Graphic Design Course
details: Graphic design is currently the most sought-after skill in Bangladesh. It is visual content that communicates ideas and thoughts through the power of art. Today, graphic design has become a prevalent and modern profession. There are many job opportunities available now. In the contemporary world, almost everything is online, so nearly all businesses want to ensure their presence online, which is why graphic designers are so important. A graphics designer is responsible for designing various products, such as the company's flyer brochures or its most important brand identity. A growing number of graphic design courses are offered to meet the increasing demand in this field! Many institutes or platforms offer Graphics Design courses in Bangladesh, some of which are designed offline and some of which are based online. Now, let's find out the most popular and best graphics design training courses and how you can determine them for yourself!

name: Professional Photography Course
details: Choosing a photography course is perhaps the best investment a novice photographer can make. But, do you know what the paradox is? Most people spend thousands of taka on a camera that has too many features. But then they don't really know how to use it!Because the truth is that all that technology is useless if you don't know how to build a perfect photo. But when it is forbidden to go out in this challenging time, how will you get the knowledge?That is the reason a reliable and accomplished online photography course in Bangladesh is essential. Dream Weaver is one of the most respected and pioneer photography companies. They've been in the business for many years, and their list of awards will prove this statement. This time, they have come forward to teach their secret of success among the armatures and enthusiasts. Along with Ghoorilearning.com, they have decorated an online photography course that will help the newcomers like anything.
